Sheryl Gay Stolberg writes that the 225 attendees were survivors of an intense winnowing-down process by a White House confronted by some of toughest jockeying for invitations in recent memory. The guest list was particularly heavy on business leaders, including General Electric CEO Jeff Immelt and Microsoft's Steve Ballmer , a trend Stolberg says made sense considering how`` Barack Obama used Mr. Hu Jintao 's visit to press China

Newport News honored Pittsburgh Steelers Coach Mike Tomlin , but that was with a proclamation, not a key. Councilwoman Tina Michael Vick would not rule out Newport News some day recognizing her nephew. Who knows, I know if he wins a Super Bowl we'll definitely be celebrating in some way, Tina Michael Vick said.

Mike Pence shut the door Thursday on seeking the presidency in 2012 but left unanswered whether his choice instead is the Indiana governor's office. I'm open to running for governor, Mike Pence said in an exclusive interview with The Indianapolis Star.`` We're going to take the next several months to travel across the state and hear what Hoosiers have to say. We'll seriously consider it.
